title: procure2innovate: European network of competence centres for innovation procurement
objective: The project procure2innovate aims at improving institutional support for public procurers of information and communication technologies (ICT) and other product groups implementing innovation procurement by establishing or expanding competence centres for innovation procurement in ten EU Member States.
coordinator: Bundesverband Materialwirtschaft, Einkauf und Logistik e.V.
participants: UPPHANDLINGSMYNDIGHETEN;CENTRO PARA EL DESARROLLO TECNOLOGICO INDUSTRIAL.;BUNDESMINISTERIUM FUER WIRTSCHAFT UND ENERGIE;ZENIT ZENTRUM FUR INNOVATION UND TECHNIK IN NORDRHEIN-WESTFALEN GMBH;BEDIN SARA;ETTEVOTLUSE ARENDAMISE SIHTASUTUS;INSTITUTO DE SALUD CARLOS III;ANI - AGENCIA NACIONAL DE INOVACAO, SA;MINISTERIE VAN ECONOMISCHE ZAKEN EN KLIMAAT;KAMMARKOLLEGIET;R&D SLUA LIMITED;BUNDESBESCHAFFUNG GMBH;ICLEI EUROPEAN SECRETARIAT GMBH (ICLEI EUROPASEKRETARIAT GMBH)*;MINISTRY OF ECONOMY AND DEVELOPMENT;INSTITUTO NACIONAL DE TECNICA AEROESPACIAL ESTEBAN TERRADAS;CONSIP SPA
